CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Natural Sciences?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Natural Sciences is arc {Engineering}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Business?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Business is arc {Engineering}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Natural Sciences} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Business to Engineering in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Natural Sciences to Engineering in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Business to Natural Sciences in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Natural Sciences and Business in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Natural Sciences and Business is {611}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Business and Engineering in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Business and Engineering is {80}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Business?
SC.A: The total flow output from Business is {866}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Engineering?
SC.A: The total flow input by Engineering is {496}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 368? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {481} from {Natural Sciences} to {Business}, a flow of {611} from {Business} to {Natural Sciences}, a flow of {488} from {Engineering} to {Natural Sciences}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 160? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {80} from {Engineering} to {Business}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 248 and 368? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {255} from {Business} to {Engineering}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Engineering to Business or from Natural Sciences to Business?
NC.A: The flow from {Natural Sciences} to {Business} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Business to Engineering, from Engineering to Natural Sciences, or from Natural Sciences to Engineering?
NC.A: The flow from {Engineering} to {Natural Sciences} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Business}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Business} and {Natural Sciences}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Engineering, Arc Natural Sciences, Arc Business}.
